VSL CONSUMES LSMGO IN MAIN AND AUX ENGINES FOR MANOEUVRING, START/STOP, CHANGE OVER OPERATIONS, NAVIGATING CANALS/RIVERS/NARROW WATERS/FOGS ETC. ABOVE SPEED & CONS IS NOT APPLICABLE WHILE VSL STEAMING/STAYING IN ECA AREAS/PORTS ON LSMGO.
